title: Matthew Stafford Now A Hall of Famer?
description:
Jalen & Jacoby discuss Matthew Stafford’s legacy and debate if he’s a Hall of Famer, plus Kyler Murray is kinda in his feelings, LeBron’s “City of Champions” joint parade idea, Aaron Rodgers’ future in Green Bay, Ben Simmons joins Nets, James Harden gets work in with Sixers, DeMar DeRozan drops another 40-piece and much more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
